title: Am I the only person that like likes the color scheme?
body: Title says it all, I can't stand white webpages and much prefer darker pages like the boards.

replies.body: I prefer dark backgrounds as well
I love it, it acctualy relax me while i watch it and my eyes doesnt tire that much anymore, I have contact lenses and after few hours on old GD all that white would just force me to take them off.

I like the idea of the color scheme but the font is too low contrast.  Need to punch it up.

Also need to offer some styling themes for those who prefer a light theme.  CSS was made to do this easily.  I suspect we'll have to wait for the FEK 3.0 release though; those guys have always been better than anyone Riot threw at the problem.
A darker theme is easier on the eyes, which is why I usually use dark themes, but this puke green theme is just horrid.

It definitley suits {{champion:56}} and maybe {{champion:238}} , however, i think some ppl also prefer a lighter colour like {{champion:99}} and {{champion:22}}  which is why I propose that there is an option to change this just like some summoners have already suggested
idk. i like the tone but it's just harsh on my {{item:2050}} {{item:2050}}

I personally like like this theme but for people with vision difficulties the lower contrast can be hard on the eyes.  Obviously tastes vary so it would be nice if Riot promoted a number of themes for those that want better visibility or differing aesthetics.

I don't like the colors but the darker theme is much easier on my eyes. I like being able to occasionally get on the boards and spend 30+min without getting a headache unlike the forums.

I do think they should make at least 1 option that flips the scheme back to lighter if that's someone's prefereance. Ideally let us choose between a couple different colors.
I would like an option to change the color scheme just for your account. This color scheme is alright, but I prefer a little more contrast or lighter webpages.
I prefer dark backgrounds but it feels like there is too much going on with the current scheme. It makes it feel unorganized and hard to find things.
I would have to agree with both you and {{champion:56}} on this one. DARKNESSSSSSSSSSSSS

Howdy boards,

I feel the gray was dark enough and the even darker text was even on the eyes. As it is now I believe the boards are actually too dark with the text too bright which hurts my eyes. If you add on the fact the boards background/colors are rather gloomy/depressing I just can't see myself being here much. I'll try to adjust, but to the best of my knowledge you are the only person that "likes" the new colors.

Happy trails,
Steinustine.
